Izeriya

Izeriya was a powerful city…but forces of evil captured it. The little man named Trix is heading to this city to destroy the evil within.

In game you will pass obstacles and fight! The game has a simple upgrade system, so you can upgrade the damage of your sword, or you can upgrade your health.

In game you will find three locations, some extra levels, and a level with a final boss (Yeah, in the game aren't a lot of levels, but levels that you can find in game are not small, and some are hardcore). So, it will be difficult :)
